name: Carbink
flavorText:
Born from the temperatures and pressures
deep underground, it fires beams from the
stone in its head.

previous.name: Dedenne
previous.flavorText:
Its whiskers serve as antennas. By sending and
receiving electrical waves, it can communicate
with others over vast distances.

next.name: Goomy
next.flavorText:
The weakest Dragon-type Pokémon,
it lives in damp, shady places, so its
body doesn’t dry out.
